Article Title: Jnanpith Award conferred on Gulzar, Rambhadracharya
Article Text:
President Draupadi Murmu presents 58th Jnanpith Award at Vigyan Bhavan

NEW DELHI: President Droupadi Murmu on Friday conferred the 58th Jnanpith Award on Sanskrit scholar Jagadguru Rambhadracharya and renowned poet-lyricist Gulzar for 2023 at a function here.Gulzar could not attend the award ceremony due to health-related issues. Murmu congratulated the 90-year-old and wished he soon becomes fully healthy and active and continues to contribute to art, literature, society and the country.Speaking about his contributions, the President said, “Gulzar sahab has kept alive his devotion towards literary creation for decades. It can be said that Gulzar sahab is a writer who has established tenderness amidst harshness. He has been awarded for his outstanding contribution to Indian literature and the world of Urdu writing”.He had received Sahitya Akademi Award in 2002, Padma Bhushan in 2004 and Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2013.Rambhadracharya, 75, founder and head of Tulsi Peeth in Chitrakoot, is a renowned Hindu spiritual leader, educator and writer. The Sanskrit scholar was given a citation plaque, a cash prize and a bronze replica of Vagdevi Saraswati. His citations highlighted that he has written more than 240 books and four epics among numerous other literary achievements. He had received Padma Vibhushan in 2015.Hindi author Vinod Kumar Shukla has been named recipient of the 59th Jnanpith Award for 2024.
Article Summary: Gulzar could not attend the award ceremony due to health-related issues. He had received sahitya akademi award in 2002, padma bhushan in 2004 and dadasaheb phalke award in 2013. The sanskrit scholar was given a citation plaque, a cash prize and a bronze replica of vagdevi saraswati.

Article Title: 'Yeh kya hai?': Rohit Sharma loses cool, scolds brother for denting his car
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (AFP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep 5: Shane Watson on how IPL gave him a lifeline & his tribute to Phil Hughes

Poll Do you believe Rohit Sharma’s achievements will inspire future cricketers? Not really. Maybe, but it depends. Definitely!

Virat Kohli retires from Test cricket after 14 years

NEW DELHI: A historic moment unfolded at the iconic Wankhede Stadium on Friday as the Rohit Sharma Stand was officially unveiled, honouring India’s ODI captain. The emotional ceremony was soon followed by a light-hearted moment that went viral — a video capturing Rohit pulling up his younger brother Vishal, reportedly over a dent in their car.In true Rohit fashion, his reaction was hilariously deadpan: “Yeh kya hai?” he asked, pointing at the damage.Vishal, caught off guard, replied sheepishly, “Reverse.”To which Rohit responded, “Kiska? Tere se?” — a quick-fire exchange that had fans in splits, many calling it “peak big brother energy.”Wankhede holds a special place in Rohit's heart — it’s where his cricketing journey took flight back in 2007. Speaking at the unveiling, the veteran batter expressed deep gratitude to everyone involved in the event and reflected on the stadium’s personal and professional significance in his life."Firstly, I would like to thank everyone who has come here to make this event so special. What is going to happen today, I never dreamt of it," Rohit said. "As a kid growing up wanting to play for Mumbai and India, no one thinks about things like these. Like any other sportsperson, I only aimed to give my best and serve the nation. While doing that, you achieve many milestones, but something like this is truly special."Rohit’s parents — Gurunath and Poornima Sharma — his wife Ritika Sajdeh, and brother Vishal were present at the stadium to witness the unveiling. Emotions ran high as Rohit acknowledged the impact of their sacrifices on his journey.“To have my name amongst legends of the game and renowned world leaders... I can’t put this feeling into words. I’m grateful to the MCA, the Apex Council, and everyone involved,” he said. “To receive this honour while I’m still playing makes it even more surreal. I’ve retired from two formats but continue to play ODIs. On the 21st, when I return here to play for Mumbai Indians against Delhi Capitals, it’ll be a truly special moment.”Rohit, who recently retired from Test cricket, has been a cornerstone of Mumbai cricket and led India to back-to-back ICC titles — the T20 World Cup in 2024 and the Champions Trophy in 2025.As he wrapped up his address, Rohit humorously noted that his Mumbai Indians teammates were eager for his speech to end so they could start their training. “It’ll be even more special when I get to play an India match at this venue again. To receive this honour in front of my parents, wife, and brother is beyond words. I’m deeply grateful for all they’ve done.”Ritika Sajdeh, often seen by Rohit’s side during tournaments and known as one of his strongest supporters, was visibly emotional throughout the event.Having debuted for India in 2007, Rohit has enjoyed a decorated international career. He was part of India’s 2007 T20 World Cup-winning squad and has represented the country in 159 T20Is, 273 ODIs, and 67 Tests. He bid farewell to T20Is after India’s title triumph in Barbados last year.
Article Summary: The rohit sharma stand was officially unveiled at the wankhede stadium on friday. Rohit's parents, wife and brother were present to witness the ceremony. The odi captain led india to back-to-back icc titles in 2024 and 2025.

Article Title: Neeraj Chopra finally breaches 90m barrier, finishes second in Doha Diamond League
Article Text:
Neeraj Chopra

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

India’s golden boy of athletics, Neeraj Chopra , scripted history on Friday evening at the Doha Diamond League 2025 by breaching the elusive 90-metre barrier in men’s javelin throw for the first time in his career. The reigning world champion recorded a best throw of 90.23 metres, becoming only the 25th athlete in history to cross the prestigious mark. However, despite his personal milestone, Chopra had to settle for second place as Germany’s Julian Weber stole the show with a winning throw of 91.06 metres.Competing at the Qatar Sports Club Stadium , Neeraj got off to a brilliant start with a strong 88.44m throw in his very first attempt, which immediately put him in the lead. His second attempt was a foul, but he bounced back in style with his third — launching the javelin to a staggering 90.23 metres. That effort not only marked a career-best for Chopra but also made him the latest entrant in the elite 90m club, a mark considered the gold standard in javelin throwing.Julian Weber, however, had other plans. The German athlete, a consistent performer on the Diamond League circuit, saved his best for the day — unleashing a mighty 91.06m throw that edged out Chopra and earned him the top podium finish.Quiz: Who's that IPL player? The milestone comes at an exciting phase in Neeraj’s career. Now under the guidance of legendary coach Jan Zelezny a three-time Olympic champion and world record holder with a throw of 98.48m , Neeraj appears to be peaking just in time for a packed athletics season. This was Chopra’s first major competition of the year after switching coaches, and his performance in Doha will surely raise expectations ahead of the Olympics and other major events.Chopra’s feat adds him to an exclusive group of 25 javelin throwers worldwide who have thrown beyond 90 metres a club that includes greats like Zelezny himself, Johannes Vetter, Thomas Röhler, and Arshad Nadeem. The 90m throw has been achieved just 126 times in history, underlining the rarity and difficulty of the achievement.Although he didn’t win the event, Neeraj’s performance has reignited excitement among Indian sports fans and experts alike, signalling a new chapter in his illustrious journey. As one of the most decorated athletes in Indian history, Neeraj continues to push boundaries, and with the 90m milestone now conquered, his sights are firmly set on even bigger glories.This Doha meet was especially crucial as Chopra will not compete later this month due to the cancellation of the NC Classic 2025 in Bengaluru. With a statement performance in Qatar, he has laid down a strong marker for the rest of the season.A strong run from India’s Parul Chaudhary saw her set a new national record in the women’s 3000m steeplechase, clocking 9:13.39 to finish a commendable sixth in a high-quality field in Doha.With this performance, Chaudhary not only raised the national benchmark but also improved significantly on her 16th-place Diamond League debut in Eugene last year.
Article Summary: Neeraj chopra recorded a best throw of 90.23 metres at the doha diamond league 2025. He is the 25th athlete in history to cross the prestigious mark. Chopra had to settle for second place as germany’s julian weber stole the show with a winning throw of 91.06 metres.

Article Title: Bad Bunny & Timothée Chalamet Set MSG Ablaze as Knicks Battle Celtics in Star-Studded Showdown
Article Text:
Bad Bunny and Timothy (Image via Sports Center)

Bad Bunny and Timothée Chalamet made a striking appearance together courtside at Game 6 of the intense 2025 NBA Eastern Conference semifinals between the New York Knicks and Boston Celtics at Madison Square Garden . Their presence added a layer of star power to an already electric atmosphere as the Knicks aimed to advance to the Eastern Conference Finals for the first time in 25 years.The Knicks-Celtics series has been a rollercoaster, with the Knicks holding a series lead. Despite Boston’s dominant scoring runs in recent games and the absence of star Jayson Tatum due to injury, the Knicks remained determined to close out the series at home. Game 6 is crucial, with the Celtics looking to make a comeback in the series and the Knicks fighting to end their long playoff drought.Bad Bunny, the global music sensation, and Timothée Chalamet, the acclaimed actor and Knicks superfan, have both been highly visible supporters of the Knicks throughout the playoffs. Chalamet, who has been attending multiple games this postseason, often sharing his enthusiasm on social media, was seen sporting Knicks gear and passionately cheering on the team. Kylie Jenner, Chalamet’s girlfriend, was also courtside, adding to the celebrity buzz surrounding the games.Their joint appearance at Game 6 was notable not only for their star status but also because it highlighted the growing intersection of pop culture and sports, especially in New York City. The Knicks’ playoff run has attracted a slew of celebrities, from Cardi B and Stefon Diggs to Ben Stiller and Lenny Kravitz, turning Madison Square Garden into a hotspot for A-list sightings as well as high-stakes basketball.The game itself has been a showcase of intense competition. The Celtics, despite missing Tatum, are delivering a strong performance led by Jaylen Brown, pushing the Knicks to the brink. The Knicks have a comfortable lead as of writing this article with the energy in the arena was palpable, fueled in part by the celebrity presence and the hopes of a city hungry for playoff success.Also read: Denver's Aaron Gordon’s Game 7 Status in Doubt After Hamstring Injury: How Nuggets Adjust Could Decide Series In sum, the Game 6 showdown is more than just a basketball game; it has turned out to be a cultural event where sports and entertainment converged. Bad Bunny and Timothée Chalamet’s courtside appearance symbolize the excitement and star-studded allure surrounding the Knicks’ playoff journey, making the night unforgettable for fans both in the arena and watching around the world.
Article Summary: Bad bunny and timothée chalamet made a striking appearance courtside at game 6 of the nba eastern conference semifinals. Their presence added a layer of star power to an already electric atmosphere as the knicks aimed to advance to the eastern conference finals for the first time in 25 years.

Article Title: Boos or not, Juan Soto stays unbothered in epic return to Yankee Stadium with Mets
Article Text:
Juan Soto faced loud boos from Yankees fans during his first at-bat in the Bronx but responded with calm confidence. (Credit: Getty Images)

Juan Soto’s cool reaction to Yankees fans' boos goes viral after Mets debut in Bronx



Juan Soto knew what was coming, and still, the moment had an electric, almost cinematic, weight to it. As the New York Mets superstar walked up to the plate at Yankee Stadium on Friday night, the Bronx faithful erupted—not in admiration, but in fury. It was a chorus of 50,000 voices united in disapproval, just as he had predicted. “50,000 fans against one,” Soto told the New York Post ahead of the Mets-Yankees clash. He wasn’t wrong.Despite the storm of boos, there was an odd poetry in the moment. Soto, ever the showman, tipped his helmet and flashed a grin, even mouthing what appeared to be a “thank you” to the home crowd. It was his first time back in the Bronx since Game 5 of the 2024 World Series—this time wearing the colors of the Mets, not the pinstripes that once defined his sensational 2024 season.In that unforgettable year, Soto had delivered an MVP-caliber performance for the Yankees—slashing .288/.419/.569 with a career-high 41 home runs and helping power the team to its first World Series appearance since 2009. His towering, go-ahead homer in the 10th inning of Game 5 of the ALCS had practically etched him into Yankee lore. But that chapter ended unexpectedly when Soto opted for a 15-year, $765 million megadeal with the Mets—just $5 million more guaranteed than the Yankees' 16-year offer.The decision stung, and Yankee fans made sure he felt it. While his first at-bat resulted in a five-pitch walk off Carlos Rodón, it wasn’t about the stats that night—it was about the theater.And the Bronx Bleacher Creatures added their own twist to the drama. When Soto took his position in right field in the bottom of the first inning, they turned their backs to him—a symbolic act of betrayal felt by the fans during his free agency departure.Oddly enough, buried beneath the thunderous boos was a standing ovation—perhaps the crowd’s way of acknowledging his past heroics while simultaneously expressing their heartbreak.For Soto, it was a homecoming defined by tension, emotion, and undeniable star power. He walked away unshaken, wearing the boos like a badge of honor.Also Read: Juan Soto returns to Yankee Stadium and gets booed in a bizarre way
Article Summary: Juan soto faced loud boos from yankees fans during his first at-bat in the bronx but responded with calm confidence. Soto, ever the showman, tipped his helmet and flashed a grin, even mouthing what appeared to be a “thank you” to the home crowd. It was his first time back in the yankees since game 5 of the 2024 world series.

Article Title: "You'll never be as good as your dad": How brutal criticism pushed Wayne Gretzky's son Ty Gretzky away from pro hockey
Article Text:
Wayne Gretzky son Ty Gretzky faced immense pressure growing up (Image via Instagram)

Being the son of “The Great One” came with more pressure than praise for young Ty Gretzky

Growing up in the shadow of hockey’s most iconic figure is no easy feat — just ask Ty Gretzky . As the eldest son of NHL legend Wayne Gretzky , Ty was never just another kid on the ice. Every shift, every goal, and every stumble came with a heavy dose of scrutiny — from teammates, rivals, and even strangers in the stands.In a candid 2006 interview with The New York Times, a 15-year-old Ty Gretzky opened up about the harsh realities of being Wayne Gretzky’s son. “I get smack-talked all the time on the ice from other players,” he said. “Just like, ‘I thought you were going to be a lot better,’ stuff like that.”Even at a young age, Ty was dealing with the weight of impossible expectations. Despite having a passion for the game, his last name made it nearly impossible to play without comparison. Speaking to Thousand Oaks Acorn, he admitted to eventually removing his last name from his jersey in an effort to blend in: “Somehow people in the stands would just find out who I was and yell, ‘You’ll never be as good as your dad in hockey.’”The pressure didn’t stop there. During his second year playing center for a lower-tier team at Shattuck-St. Mary’s School — a well-known hockey academy — Ty managed four goals and six assists over 29 games. Still, his stats were often overshadowed by his surname. “It wasn’t just about playing hockey anymore,” Ty implied. “It became about living up to a legacy I didn’t ask for.”Ultimately, Ty chose not to pursue hockey professionally, but he never abandoned the game. Instead, he found a meaningful way to stay connected to the sport — and to his father. In 2014, he co-founded The Gretzky Hockey School alongside Wayne, creating a space where young players can develop their skills without the burden of comparison.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky's son Ty Gretzky’s Mother’s Day post hides a deeper message about family legacy Ty’s story is a poignant reminder that even in the world of sports royalty, carving out your own identity can be the biggest challenge of all.
Article Summary: Ty gretzky is the eldest son of nhl legend wayne gretzki. Growing up in the shadow of his famous father, he faced immense pressure. In 2006, a 15-year-old ty said he removed his last name from his jersey to blend in. He chose not to pursue hockey professionally, but never abandoned the game.

Article Title: Red carpet moment incoming? Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s long-awaited red carpet debut could finally happen at the 2025 Kids’ Choice Awards
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce may make their red carpet debut at the 2025 Kids’ Choice Awards (Credit: Getty Images)

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce earn nominations in top categories, sparking red carpet speculation

Will Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce finally give fans the moment they’ve been waiting for?

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce might be stepping into the spotlight together—officially. The superstar couple, whose relationship has captivated fans worldwide since going public, could make their long-awaited red carpet debut next month at the 2025 Kids’ Choice Awards on June 21.While both have maintained a relatively low profile since the NFL season ended, a shared nomination night could be the perfect moment for them to finally appear hand-in-hand before the cameras.Taylor Swift has landed two major nominations: “Favorite Female Artist” and “Favorite Song” for her chart-topper “I Can Do It With a Broken Heart.” She’s up against big names like Ariana Grande, Sabrina Carpenter, Kendrick Lamar, and her close friend Selena Gomez.Travis Kelce, meanwhile, is nominated in the “Favorite Male Sports Star” category, a nod to his dominant performance in the NFL. He and his brother Jason Kelce also earned recognition for their hit podcast “New Heights,” nominated in the “Favorite Podcast” category.With both Swift and Kelce being celebrated individually at the same event, fans are buzzing over the possibility that this may mark their first official red carpet appearance as a couple.Since their whirlwind romance became public in 2023, Swift and Kelce have mostly kept their outings under the radar. Apart from joint sightings and cozy post-game celebrations, the duo has chosen to remain private—leaving fans hungry for a full-fledged joint appearance at a high-profile event.Earlier this month, Swifties hoped to see the pair walk the Met Gala red carpet, but scheduling conflicts reportedly kept them away. However, with the Kids’ Choice Awards falling during a quieter stretch for both stars, the timing seems ideal.Recently, the couple was spotted in Philadelphia celebrating Mother’s Day with their families—a rare but heartwarming public sighting. These low-key moments only add to the anticipation of seeing them take on a glitzy event together.Also Read: Travis Kelce dating Taylor Swift is costing NFL fans hundreds of dollars — and frustrated Chiefs supporters are calling it the ‘Swift tax’ If they do show up at the Kids’ Choice Awards, it won’t just be a photo-op—it’ll be a cultural moment fans have been waiting for. And with both nominated for major honors, June 21 might just be the night Swift and Kelce finally own the red carpet as a duo.
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce may make their red carpet debut at the 2025 kids’ choice awards on june 21. The superstar couple, whose relationship has captivated fans worldwide since going public, are both nominated for major honors.

Article Title: UFC boss Dana White downplays Conor McGregor’s request in a shocking revelation - “He is not fighting anytime soon”
Article Text:
Conor McGregor and Dana White. Photo by Chris Unger/Zuffa LLC via Getty Images

UFC

boss

Dana White

Conor McGregor’s vague comeback statement continues to be a mere gimmick as UFC CEO Dana White dismisses any possible bout for the fighter

MMA fans finally have an answer, as the, on Friday, May 16, 2025, dismissed the idea of Conor McGregor ’s return to the Octagon. Supporters of the Irish fighter had a hope when the Notorious recently posted a set of cryptic words on his Instagram story, which were still dicey owing to the fighter’s previous vague statements of picking up the gloves again.Former UFC champion Conor McGregor was last seen going head-on against Dustin Poirier at UFC 264, where the former broke his leg during the bout. Post that, the Irish fighter was supposed to face Michael Chandler at UFC 303 but had to withdraw owing to a toe injury. Since then, there have been no signs of the fighter stepping back into the Octagon anytime soon. Instead of any concrete announcement or confirmation of a comeback bout, the fighter engages in posting occasional training clips and cryptic statements that partly hint at his return to the Octagon.Recently, the fighter was seen posting a series of cryptic messages on his Instagram stories directed towards the UFC executives and the boss, Dana White. Across two different stories, his statements read“@danawhite @tkogroup call that big b**t nurse”“Let’s get this show started @ufc”It has been quite some time since the fighter had last tagged the promotion and its executives directly in a comeback statement. Which is why fans were somewhat more optimistic rather than being sceptical about McGregor’s potential comeback.But much to the dismay of the community, Dana White, on May 16, made a revelation about his recent interaction with McGregor, which crushed the hopes of the fans. In a recent clip, the UFC CEO makes a statement about the potential comeback of the fighter, “He is not fighting anytime soon. I haven’t talked to him in a minute. Yeah…I don’t know.”Also read: UFC color commentator Daniel Cormier reacts to heavyweight champion Jon Jones’ hypothetical claims Dana White, plain and simple, dismissed the fighter’s supposed request that was made via the Instagram stories. Fighters like Michael Chandler, too, waited for McGregor to step back into the Octagon before finally moving on with other fighters, thereby concentrating on their own careers. With White’s statement, McGregor’s claims become irrelevant, and fans can now be assured about the probable future of the fighter inside the Octagon.
Article Summary: Conor mcgregor was last seen going head-on against dustin poirier at ufc 264. The irish fighter was supposed to face michael chandler at ufc 303 but had to withdraw owing to a toe injury. Since then, there have been no signs of the fighter stepping back into the octagon anytime soon.

Article Title: Kevin Durant Claps Back at FS1’s Emmanuel Acho Over Jayson Tatum Comments
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Kevin Durant brutally slams ex NFL player, Emmanuel Acho, and fans agree with the NBA star



Kevin Durant, one of the most popular and talented players in the NBA , has never been afraid to share his strong opinions and this time, he has slammed ex NFL player and analyst Emmanuel Acho. Emmanuel Acho had made a few controversial comments regarding Boston Celtics ’ Jayson Tatum ’s injury and its impact on the team and it seems Kevin Durant is not happy with such comments and fans agree.Recently, former NFL player, Emmanuel Acho appeared on Thursday’s episode of “The Facility” and said, “The Boston Celtics match up better versus the New York Knicks without Jayson Tatum than they do with of Jayson Tatum — not because of talent, exclusively because of mindset…”The comments had raised some eyebrows and now Kevin Durant has slammed Emmanuel Acho.Kevin Durant took to his X account and posted, "Hot take artist have ruined the sport. Football guys, no disrespect but yall boys need to stay In ya lanes, u don’t know what it’s like it between these lines man give it a break. Dudes who quit football early to pursue media talkin mental toughness, cut it out” and fans are here for it.A fan commented, “W for KD. I don’t see Shaq talking about football so why we got Acho talking about basketball”, while another fan joked, “the real crazy part is many former NFL players arent equipped to discuss the NFL either.”A third fan wrote, “This is true. No credibility but they get the platform to speak if they can generate viewership”, while another fan posted, “They should get criticized more cause I have homies with better hot takes than the stupid shit FS1 be talking about most of the time.”A fifth fan noted, “One thing you gotta appreciate about KD is he’s not afraid to speak his mind 🗣️ 🧠 & often times he makes a lot of sense!”At this point, the Boston Celtics’ star, Jayson Tatum has not yet reacted to Emmanuel Acho’s comments as he recovers from his injury. Jayson Tatum will not be available for the rest of the post season.Also Read: “Never have a shortage of guys”: Scottie Pippen's ex-wife Larsa Pippen breaks silence on fling with Malik Beasley as fans call her out
Article Summary: Kevin durant has slammed ex nfl player and analyst emmanuel acho. Acho had made controversial comments regarding boston celtics’ jayson tatum ’s injury and its impact on the team. Kevin durant took to his x account and posted, "hot take artist have ruined the sport"

Article Title: Emotional Ritika Sajdeh in tears as Rohit Sharma stand inaugurated at Wankhede - Watch
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma with his wife Ritika Sajdeh and daughter Samaira

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!



Rohit Sharma’s last press conference as a captain

It was an evening of emotion, legacy, and heartfelt tributes at the Wankhede Stadium as the Mumbai Cricket Association (MCA) officially unveiled the Rohit Sharma Stand honouring one of Mumbai’s finest cricketing sons. But amid the cheers, applause, and camera flashes, what truly moved hearts was a quiet, tearful moment Ritika Sajdeh , Rohit Sharma’s wife, was seen holding back tears as her husband’s name lit up the iconic stadium.A video now going viral captures Ritika in the stands, visibly emotional as the Divecha Pavilion Level 3 was officially renamed after the India and Mumbai Indians captain. The moment wasn’t just a tribute to Rohit’s cricketing journey, it was a culmination of years of dedication, sacrifice, and support behind the scenes.From Borivali’s bylanes to the world’s grandest cricketing stages, Rohit Sharma’s rise has been spectacular. But through every high and heartbreak, Ritika has stood by him from his career-defining double centuries to the heartbreaks of World Cup exits. Her teary-eyed reaction encapsulated the personal side of this professional triumph.Quiz: Who's that IPL player? As tributes poured in including a moving Instagram post from teammate and close friend Suryakumar Yadav it became clear this wasn’t just about a name on a stand. It was about what Rohit represents: consistency, calm, class and the people who’ve journeyed with him, quietly in the background.Surya’s message read:"Congratulations @rohitsharma45 on achieving incredible things on the cricket ground, from finisher to opener to our captain, you have been an inspiration and our pride, in every role.Very rarely comes a leader who leads from the front, and changes the game for better. You are that leader, who has changed not just the game, but the approach, the attitude, the dressing room atmosphere, the team and redefined the role of a captain.Like I have said before, good things happen to good people, and you deserve it all and more. Wankhede just got even more iconic.."Also present was MI owner Akash Ambani , who called Rohit's honour “a moment that will inspire an entire generation.”With over 19,700 international runs, 49 centuries, a 2024 T20 World Cup title, and five IPL championships, Rohit’s cricketing stats are monumental but it was Ritika’s silent tears that perhaps spoke loudest. A reminder that behind every great athlete is a story of partnership, perseverance, and unconditional love.
Article Summary: The mumbai cricket association unveiled the rohit sharma stand at the wankhede stadium. Ritika sajdeh was seen holding back tears as her husband’s name lit up the iconic stadium. The moment wasn’t just a tribute to rohit's cricketing journey, it was a culmination of years of dedication, sacrifice, and support behind the scenes.

Article Title: Former WWE announcer Samantha Irvin's return to wrestling confirmed
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Samantha Irvin will return to wrestling after her surprise departure from WWE

“She says that she’s going to… she said on her social media that she plans to return eventually. Absolutely. But right now, she’s honestly loving life. And whenever that is, it’s whatever she feels is best. At this point right now, she’s really just loving her entire life—being home, being with her daughter, the puppies at home. It’s great.”

Ricochet Unfiltered: AEW Star Talks Je'Von Evans Drama, Internet Backlash & Samantha Irvin’s Future

Samantha Irvin left the wrestling world to pursue other ventures, but it has been confirmed that she will make her return eventually.Samantha Irvin rose to prominence as one of the top WWE ring announcers of all time. Her distinctive style, social media antics and presence captivated that audience and led to her gaining multiple fans. However, to the shock of many, Irvin unexpectedly resigned from the company before an episode of RAW in October 2024. Months later, after being involved in new ventures, her return to wrestling was confirmed by one of the closest people in her life.During an appearance on the Battleground podcast, Samantha Irvin's husband, Ricochet, was asked about her return to wrestling. The former WWE United States Champion stated that she will eventually. Ricochet reminded that Irvin herself said it on social media. However, he was not sure when, as Irvin was content with her life at the moment, being at home with her daughter, pursuing other interests, and more.Ricochet said,Ricochet and Samantha Irvin came close to each other during their tenure in WWE. The One and Only superstar left WWE last year after his contract came to an end. He then made his spectacular debut in AEW at their premier event, All In 2024. On the other hand, Samantha Irvin also left WWE just a few weeks later after her husband's departure.Currently, Irvin has been putting her full focus on her music career, with her latest music video ' Shawty Wanna ' garnering major attention. Although the video was not visible on YouTube for a while due to some errors, Irvin recently announced that it was back up. While Ricochet confirmed her return to wrestling, it remains to be seen if it will be for her former company, WWE or AEW, where her husband is thriving as a top star.Also read: Rumored WWE prospect clears the air after dating rumors take over social media
Article Summary: Samantha irvin will return to wrestling after her surprise departure from wwe. Her husband, ricochet, confirmed the news on the battleground podcast. Ricochet and irvin came close to each other during their time in wwe. Irvin is currently focusing on her music career.

Article Title: Bill Belichick reveals “personal relationship” with 24-year old girlfriend Jordon Hudson, details her role in life and UNC Football
Article Text:
Bill Belichick gets candid about girlfriend Jordon Hudson (Image via: Getty Images)

Bill Belichick addresses relationship with Jordon Hudson amid media scrutiny and UNC Football commitments



Bill Belichick has spent decades mastering the art of keeping his personal life out of the headlines but that’s changed in a big way. The legendary coach, now leading UNC football, is making waves off the field thanks to his relationship with 24-year-old girlfriend Jordon Hudson . From media interviews to viral moments, their relationship has become a hot topic and for the first time, Belichick is opening up about it. So what does Hudson really mean to him, and how does she fit into his famously focused world?Belichick’s relationship with Hudson has become a lightning rod for media attention in recent weeks. From an awkward interview on CBS Sunday Morning to being featured in the Atlanta Falcons’ 2025 schedule release video, the romance has become part of the sports conversation, whether the coach likes it or not.Speaking to SportsCenter during the ACC Spring Meetings , Belichick made it clear that Hudson is not involved in North Carolina football. “She does the business things that don't relate to North Carolina that come up in my life so I can concentrate on football,” he stated. Hudson, who helped with his recent book, especially the tribute pages has become, as Belichick put it, a grounding presence behind the scenes.In a follow-up appearance on Good Morning America, co-host Michael Strahan asked what Jordon means to him. Belichick replied, “We have a good personal relationship,” before quickly pivoting away from further personal discussion.For a coach who has built his legacy on tunnel vision and minimal distractions, the relationship has sparked a unique blend of curiosity and criticism. With an age gap of nearly 50 years and Belichick’s role as a high-profile figure at UNC, the scrutiny is understandable, even if it’s unwelcome.Also Read: Dallas Cowboys and Micah Parsons locked in intense contract negotiations over $200 Million deal Still, the legendary coach insists he’s happy and focused. Despite the headlines, he’s maintaining his grip on football operations, while Hudson supports him from the periphery. The relationship, he suggests, isn’t a distraction, it’s a source of stability.
Article Summary: Bill belichick opens up about his relationship with girlfriend jordon hudson. The new england patriots coach has been dating the 24-year-old for a year. Hudson is not involved in north carolina football, according to belichick. The relationship isn't a distraction, it's a source of stability, he said.

Article Title: FIFA Club World Cup 2025: Where to watch live in the US, venue list, teams, and ticket prices
Article Text:

Star players to watch in FIFA Club World Cup 2025

A new era for the FIFA Club World Cup

The FIFA Club World Cup 2025 is set to be a landmark event in the world of football, marking a significant departure from its traditional format. Scheduled to take place in the United States from June 15 to July 13, 2025, the tournament will feature an expanded lineup of 32 teams for the first time, replacing the previous seven-team structure. This shift aims to create a more competitive and globally representative tournament, aligning it with the format of the prestigious FIFA World Cup. Here you can explore the new tournament format, participating teams, venues, ticket information, and live streaming options for fans worldwide.The tournament will be broadcast globally, with multiple platforms providing live coverage:Fans worldwide can tune in to watch all 63 matches live, ensuring they don’t miss a moment of the action.Tickets for the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup are now available through various platforms, including:Fans can also look for deals through platforms like Ticombo and SportsEvents365. Promotional codes, such as VARIETY10 for $10 off and VAR30 for $20 off at Vivid Seats, can help fans save on ticket purchases.For the first time, 32 clubs from six different football confederations will compete for the prestigious title. This expanded format is designed to bring more competitive balance and global representation to the tournament. The participating teams will include:The tournament will kick off with a group stage, where the 32 teams will be divided into eight groups of four. The top two teams from each group will advance to the knockout stages, which include the Round of 16, quarter-finals, semi-finals, and the final. This structure mirrors the classic FIFA World Cup format, adding more high-stakes matches to the tournament.The 2025 FIFA Club World Cup will be played across 12 stadiums in 11 U.S. cities, showcasing some of the most iconic sporting venues in the world. The final will be held at the MetLife Stadium in New Jersey, a venue known for hosting major NFL games and concerts. The full list of host stadiums includes:These venues have been selected for their world-class facilities and history of hosting major sporting events, ensuring a high-quality experience for players and fans alike.The tournament is expected to feature some of the biggest names in football, including global superstars like Lionel Messi, Kylian Mbappé, Jude Bellingham, and others. With teams like Manchester City and Chelsea already confirmed based on their UEFA Champions League performances from 2020 to 2024, fans can anticipate high-intensity matches filled with skill and drama.The 2025 edition of the FIFA Club World Cup marks a bold transformation, reflecting the growing popularity of club football globally. This revamped version, held every four years, aims to provide a grander stage for the world’s top football clubs, akin to the FIFA World Cup. The tournament's timing has also been shifted from December to the summer, aligning it with the international football calendar and allowing for better player participation and fan engagement.
Article Summary: The fifa club world cup 2025 is set to be a landmark event in the world of football. Scheduled to take place in the united states from june 15 to july 13, 2025, the tournament will feature an expanded lineup of 32 teams for the first time. The tournament will be played across 12 stadiums in 11 u.s. cities, showcasing some of the most iconic sporting venues.

Article Title: NBA Draft analyst hints at Cedric Coward not joining Duke Blue Devils
Article Text:
NBA Draft analyst hints at Cedric Coward not joining Duke Blue Devils (Image Credit: Getty Images)

NBA Draft analyst expressed view on Cedric Coward’s joining Duke Blue Devils

Recapping Cedric Coward's 2024-2025 college basketball season

'Cedric Coward is likely gone' | Where does Duke turn if Coward STAYS in the Draft? | FIELD OF 68

Cedric Coward performed brilliantly in the NBA Draft Combine and stood out in the physical attributes as well. It has become a matter of concern for the Duke Blue Devils , who may have to face tough competition to have Coward by their side. NBA Draft analyst Jonathan Givony also hinted at the possibility of Coward not returning to Duke’s campus in his recent tweet.Firstly, it was Cooper Flagg becoming the No.1 pick and gravitating towards the Dallas Mavericks; now it is Cedric Coward showing interest in testing new waters (as per his Instagram post). The Duke Blue Devils may have to adjust to a shrinking roster with two top picks slipping from their hands. The situation has become more evident after the NBA Draft Combine, in which Cedric Coward checked various boxes with ease. His brilliance in athletics, shooting rate, and physical attributes must have left several NBA teams vying for his attention. Taking stock of the situation, the NBA Draft analyst, Jonathan Givony, expressed his view on Coward’s future on X, tweeting:“Footage of Duke-commit Cedric Coward at the NBA draft combine. 6'6 1/2 wing shot the ball well in drills (made 72% of his aggregate jumpers) and measured a 7'2 wingspan. Sounding increasingly unlikely he'll step foot on campus in Durham.”Cedric Coward stood out in both physical attributes and athletic parameters. Given the race among the NBA teams for picking the best for the respective rosters, it is quite likely that Coward will be surrounded by suitors in June. It has definitely weakened chances for the Duke Blue Devils to have an ensemble roster in place and has increased difficulties for the team.Though several media reports suggest that Coward committed himself to the Duke, but his media sessions tell otherwise. Whether he will be keeping his commitment or will be busy trying new waters remains to see.From the views of the NBA Draft Combine, Cedric Coward seems to be in his best health and completely fit to take on the NBA challenges. However, his 2024-2025 college basketball season didn’t go as expected. He suffered a shoulder injury just after the first six games, which cut short his season unexpectedly.Playing for the Washington State, he had an impactful run despite a shortened season. He averaged 17.7 points per game, and delivered 55.7% field-goal percentage. It is his exceptional shooting ability and formidable physical attributes that have started murmurs around his plausible future course in the NBA.Also Read: Cooper Flagg’s performance leads Duke Blue Devil to major win over Illinois fighting Illini Cedric Coward’s NBA Draft Combine performance is certainly an achievement for the player who was a no body once. However, it is going to be a concerning matter for the Duke Blue Devils, who have welcomed the prodigy with open arms, but his staying in the draft has put them in fix.
Article Summary: Nba draft analyst hints at cedric coward not joining duke blue devils. Coward stood out in both physical attributes and athletic parameters. It is quite likely that coward will be surrounded by suitors in june. It has definitely weakened chances for the duke blue devil to have an ensemble roster in place.

Article Title: “God, how blessed I am”- Yankees infielder Oswaldo Cabrera expresses gratitude after his brutal ankle injury
Article Text:
“God, how blessed I am”- Yankees infielder Oswaldo Cabrera expresses gratitude after his brutal ankle injury (Image Source: Instagram)

Yankees star Oswaldo Cabrera opens up on his brutal ankle injury

"When I woke up, one of the first things I did was grab my phone. I didn’t have hundreds; I had THOUSANDS of messages from my family, friends, fans, agents, coaches, teammates…—I simply had messages from EVERYONE. I dropped the phone on the bed, and with a big SMILE on my face, the first thing I could say was, “God, how blessed I am.”

"...And TODAY, after a successful surgery with an excellent medical team and God, with my parents, my fiancée, and my agent, my heart full of love, I want to THANK YOU ALL. My return to the field begins today. Thanks to you, I feel more motivated than ever. So, with the strength I’ve always had and all this beautiful energy that you all give to me , I tell you that I will return, and I will return even stronger to continue giving my best every day. I LOVE U ALL.”

The New York Yankees suffered a major setback after Oswaldo Cabrera met with a severe ankle injury during their recent face-off with the Seattle Mariners . During the game, the Venezuelan baseball athlete suffered a fracture in his left ankle after he accidentally fell over his feet and was unable to stand. He was lifted off in an ambulance to a local hospital. Recently, Cabrera opened up on his ankle injury and even expressed gratitude to his family, friends, and fans for motivating him.Yankees infielder Oswaldo Cabrera poured his heart out in a recent post on social media while expressing his gratitude for his family, friends, and supportive fans across the globe. Cabrera was overwhelmed with all the love and support he was subjected to after his severe ankle injury. He took to Instagram and posted about the recent update on his injury. His post mentionedThe Yankees star further wrote,Looking at the severity of his ankle injury, Oswaldo Cabrera was immediately placed on the injured list for 10 days by the New York Yankees. He has been replaced by the Yankees infielder DJ LeMahieu for the 2025 MLB season, who completed his rehab session after being on the injured list.Also Read: Yankees star Oswaldo Cabrera leaves the game in ambulance after being down with serious ankle injury
Article Summary: Yankees infielder oswaldo cabrera suffered a severe ankle injury during their recent face-off with the seattle mariners. The venezuelan baseball athlete suffered a fracture in his left ankle after he accidentally fell over his feet and was unable to stand.

Article Title: Rohit Sharma Stand: Video: Rohit Sharma gets emotional as parents inaugurate stand with his name at Wankhede
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma with his parents and wife during the event at Wankhede. (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Greenstone Lobo predicts Virat Kohli & Rohit Sharma's ODI future

NEW DELHI: In a landmark tribute to one of Indian cricket 's modern greats, the Mumbai Cricket Association (MCA) on Friday officially inaugurated the Rohit Sharma Stand at the iconic Wankhede Stadium . The honour, conferred on India's ODI captain and Mumbai Indians legend, marked an emotional milestone in his decorated career.The MCA also unveiled three other commemorative sections — the Sharad Pawar Stand , the Ajit Wadekar Stand , and the MCA Office Lounge was dedicated to former MCA President Amol Kale's memory.The newly renamed Rohit Sharma Stand at Divecha Pavilion Level 3 celebrates the journey of a local boy from Borivali who went on to become one of world cricket's most accomplished batters. Rohit, visibly moved, delivered a heartfelt speech in front of family, teammates, and dignitaries."It'll be a surreal feeling on the 21st (May) when I come here and play against Delhi Capitals representing Mumbai Indians," Rohit said. "And to have a stand, it will be a very, very special feeling. And it'll be even more special while representing the country. Whenever that happens, it's going to mean even more."He expressed deep gratitude to the MCA, Mumbai Indians, and his family: "So many people, especially my mom and dad, my brother, his wife, and my wife — very special people in my life — have sacrificed so much for me to be standing here today."The entire Mumbai Indians squad was present to support their iconic former captain on this proud occasion."I know my team is waiting for my speech to end so they can start training," Rohit joked, before thanking MCA officials, the media, and special guests including Sharad Pawar and CM Devendra Fadnavis. "This is a very special day in my life which I will never forget."Rohit recently led India to the ICC T20 World Cup title and previously won the 2013 ICC Champions Trophy. He has 19,700 international runs, 49 centuries, and the world-record 264 in ODIs. Under his leadership, MI has won a record five IPL titles.In addition, Ajit Wadekar and Sharad Pawar were honoured with Grand Stands Level 4 and 3 respectively, recognising their immense contributions to Indian cricket and the MCA.
Article Summary: The rohit sharma stand at the iconic wankhede stadium was officially inaugurated on friday. The honour, conferred on india's odi captain and mumbai indians legend, marked an emotional milestone in his decorated career. Rohit delivered a heartfelt speech in front of family, teammates, and dignitaries.

Article Title: 'A young boy from Borivali ...': Akash Ambani congratulates Rohit Sharma on Wankhede stand honour
Article Text: Akash Ambani lauded Rohit Sharma as the Mumbai Cricket Association unveiled a stand named in his honour at Wankhede Stadium. Ambani highlighted Sharma's journey from Borivali to becoming a global cricket icon, inspiring a new generation. Sharma's contributions to Mumbai Indians and the Indian national team were celebrated, marking his legacy at the iconic venue.
Article Summary: Akash ambani lauded rohit sharma as the mumbai cricket association unveiled a stand named in his honour at wankhede stadium. Ambani highlighted sharma's journey from borivali to becoming a global cricket icon. Sharma's contributions to mumbai indians and the indian national team were celebrated.

Article Title: Neeraj Chopra speaks on relationship with Arshad Nadeem for first time since Pahalgam attack
Article Text:
**EDS, YEARENDERS 2024: PARIS OLYMPICS** **EDS: COMBO PHOTO** Paris: In this combo photo, (L-R) Pakistan's Arshad Nadeem and India's Neeraj Chopra celebrate after their respective second attempts during the men's javelin throw final at the 2024 Summer Olympics, in Paris, France. Nadeem won the gold medal and Chopra won the silver medal in the event. (PTI Photo/Ravi Choudhary) (

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Should athletes from rival countries be encouraged to build friendships? It depends on the situation No, they should focus on competition Yes, it promotes unity

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep 5: Shane Watson on how IPL gave him a lifeline & his tribute to Phil Hughes

Two-time Olympic medallist Neeraj Chopra on Thursday clarified that he and Arshad Nadeem were never close "friends" and indicated that the recent tensions following the Pahalgam attack , which significantly strained India-Pakistan relations, would likely affect their future interactions."First of all, I really want to clarify that I don't have a very strong relationship [with Arshad Nadeem]," he told reporters ahead of the Doha Diamond League "Yes, as athletes, we do interact. I have some good friends within the athletic community and from all around the world. Furthermore, if someone addresses me respectfully, I reciprocate that respect."" Javelin throwers are a relatively small community, and everyone competes for their country, aiming to give their best. So, it will continue to be that way. However, given the current circumstances, things won't be the same [referring to the recent tension]," he stated.At Doha, Chopra will compete against two-time world champion and 2024 Olympics bronze medallist Anderson Peters of Grenada, Jakub Vadlejch of Czechia, who won here in 2024, the German duo of Julian Weber and Max Dehning, Kenya's Julius Yego, and Roderick Genki Dean of Japan.Chopra's compatriot Kishore Jena , who secured a javelin silver medal at the Asian Games but has been struggling recently, will also be among the eleven competitors.Jena (Personal Best: 87.54m) also competed here in 2024, finishing ninth with a throw of 76.31m.Vadlejch won the event last year with a best throw of 88.38m, while Chopra finished just 2cm behind with 88.36m. Peters secured third place with 86.62m.Chopra, who won gold at the Tokyo Olympics in 2021 and then a silver at the 2024 Paris Games, first competed in the Doha DL in 2018, finishing fourth with a best throw of 87.43m.After his Tokyo Olympics gold, he won the title here in 2023 (88.67m) and finished second in 2024 (88.36m). He will be aiming to reclaim the Doha DL title.
Article Summary: Two-time olympic medallist neeraj chopra on thursday clarified that he and arshad nadeem were never close "friends" chopra indicated that the recent tensions following the pahalgam attack, which significantly strained india-pakistan relations, would likely affect their future interactions.

Article Title: Dallas Cowboys and Micah Parsons locked in intense contract negotiations over $200 Million deal
Article Text:
Parsons’ deal delay challenges Cowboys’ plans (Image via: Getty Images)

Micah Parsons contract talks highlight Dallas Cowboys’ salary cap pressure



Do Ravens or Bills have better odds of winning SB, Micah Parsons: Cowboys will have 12 wins | SPEAK

The Dallas Cowboys and Micah Parsons are at the center of a heated contract standoff grabbing the attention of NFL fans and experts alike. Reports claimed a handshake deal was already in place, but Parsons quickly took to social media to label those rumors as completely false. The core issue is Parsons seeking a massive $200 million extension that would not only break records for defensive players but also make him the highest-paid non-quarterback in NFL history, surpassing Ja’Marr Chase’s recent $161 million deal.Micah Parsons is no ordinary player. As a four-time Pro Bowler and two-time All-Pro, his dominance on the field has earned him superstar status. The Dallas Cowboys have shown they are willing to invest heavily in their top talent, recently signing Dak Prescott and CeeDee Lamb to major contracts. However, Parsons’ contract negotiations are progressing at a different pace, raising questions about the team’s salary cap flexibility and their approach to negotiations. Some wonder if the Cowboys are holding back to control Parsons’ demands, or if they are simply limited by the financial commitments they have already made.Adding to the uncertainty is the public clash between media reports and Parsons’ own statements, which has created confusion about the transparency of the talks. The longer the Cowboys delay, the more leverage Parsons gains, especially since his current contract only covers this season. The possibility of a holdout is becoming more real, which could disrupt Dallas’ defensive plans and affect team chemistry.Also Read: Is Travis Kelce escaping to $20M Florida estate amid NFL offseason and media spotlight on relationship with Taylor Swift? In the end, both Parsons and the Cowboys appear committed to building a future together. The key question is how much Dallas is willing to pay to keep their defensive star. Contracts of this size are rare in today’s NFL and require a careful balance between player value and salary cap management. As the season opener nears, pressure is mounting for both sides to reach an agreement. Whether the Cowboys finalize the deal or the standoff continues, the outcome will play a major role in shaping the team’s competitive future and could redefine the market for defensive players across the league.
Article Summary: The dallas cowboys and micah parsons are at the center of a heated contract standoff. Reports claimed a handshake deal was already in place, but parsons quickly took to social media to label those rumors as completely false.

Article Title: Carmelo Anthony recalls powerful ancestral roots after watching Ryan Coogler’s latest masterpiece Sinners: “It is horror at the end of the day”
Article Text:
Carmelo Anthony and Ryan Coogler. Image via: 7PM in Brooklyn/ YouTube (screengrab) | Dia Dipasupil/ Getty Images

Carmelo Anthony showered praise on Ryan Coogler for his recent movie, Sinners



Spike Lee on Ryan Coogler & Why ‘Sinners’ is “The Greatest Experience”

NBA legend Carmelo Anthony was inspired by acclaimed director Ryan Coogler ’s latest horror masterpiece, Sinners, as the movie resonated with his ancestral roots, which the horror flick depicted. The original horror adventure that claimed a stunning 97% score on the Tomatometer has been hailed as one of the best movies of the genre in recent times. Melo has showered his praise on the filmmaker for his representation of the cultural heritage.Ryan Coogler’s latest opus, Sinners, has made a wave across the globe, revolutionizing the horror genre with a fresh take. NBA legend Carmelo Anthony recently had a chat with Spike Lee on his 7PM in Brooklyn with Carmelo Anthony podcast, where the duo discussed the dominant impact Coogler had with his movie starring Michael B. Jordan , Hailee Steinfeld, and co.“I just love to see him work,” Anthony said. “And and and going back to our history, black history. Like our story is so strong and deep-rooted that a lot of it is horror at the end of the day, right? So to be able to artistically like put that into story, you know, to film making to be able to still keep the essence of what we built and our ancestors and the spirit built this country, you know what I mean? Like the spirit of our ancestors, the spirit of the land.”The 10-time All-Star further described that trauma doesn’t just affect the mind; it lingers deep in the soul. “We have it in us,” he said, repeating the phrase with intensity. “Until you're able to face that, you ain't going to understand that.”The former NBA star praised Coogler’s fearless storytelling, stating that it is rare to see someone explore Black trauma so directly and effectively through art. “I think him exposing that Black trauma, whereas a lot of people wouldn't want to touch that… I don't think a lot of people could do it that way,” Carmelo explained.Carmelo also touched on the daily struggles many in the community face, “We wonder why we stressed out… we upset or we having bad days. You know, trauma,” he sharedUltimately, Sinners resonated with the NBA legend, “We deal with our own demons. Like sinners, dog,” he said. For Carmelo, the film holds up a mirror to the generational pain many carry.Also Read: “Lost the game because…” — Magic Johnson reveals key reason behind New York Knicks’ Game 5 loss to Boston Celtics Legendary Hollywood director Spike Lee, who is also set to release his latest movie Highest 2 Lowest starring his long-time collaborator Denzel Washington, gave his best to Coogler.“This film is gonna be very successful,” Lee said. “And I think we need this film now, too. We need this film, and it's not just to get a black audience either… This is a riddle screenplay. All this is his,” he added.Sinners is now showing in theaters.
Article Summary: Ryan coogler’s latest opus, sinners, has made a wave across the globe, revolutionizing the horror genre with a fresh take. Nba legend carmelo anthony recently had a chat with spike lee on his 7pm in brooklyn podcast.
